column3: Partial (not all features available, e.g. Project, Visio, Access)
Mac OS X v10.3 or above

column2: Can interface with email clients and Mail Merge Wizard can send email directly from LibreOffice[26]
column5: Currently via free plugins; LibreOffice Online under development.[27]

column2: Microsoft Outlook (Not included in Microsoft Office 2013 or 2016 Home & Student)[28][29]
column3: Microsoft SharePoint Designer. Versions after Office 2000 Premium and Developer contain Microsoft FrontPage, the full-blown web page editor. Microsoft Word can read and write HTML starting with a free special upgrade for Word 6.0

column2: OfficeSuite Mail for Windows, AquaMail for Android
